insert.sql: set @UserID=(if(@UserID;>0,@UserID,(select UserID from ut_users where Login=@Login; and @Login<>'' limit 0,1))) #set @error=(if((@UserID='' or @UserID is null) and @Type;<>'*' and @TypeID;='','Пользователь не найден',0)) #insert into ut_posts( PostID, UnionID, UserID, StartDate, EndDate, TypeID) values( '', @UnionID;, @UserID, @Date;, '', @TypeID;)

field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select t.TypeID,concat(t.Name_$lang;,' (',c.Name_$lang;,')') from ut_post_types t left outer join ut_post_classes c on c.ClassID=t.ClassID order by t.Name_$lang;

select.sql: select p.*,c.Name_$lang; as Structure, concat(u.FirstName,' ',u.LastName,' (',u.Login,')') as User,t.Name_$lang; as Type from ut_posts p left outer join ut_post_types t on t.TypeID=p.TypeID left outer join ut_post_classes c on t.ClassID=c.ClassID left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=p.UserID order by Structure,Type

update.select: select p.*,u.Login from ut_posts p left outer join ut_users u using(UserID) where p.PostID=@id;
